Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $80. Considering its high quality and the benefits it provides, I believe this is an excellent opportunity for you to enhance your experience. I kindly invite you to accept this offer at the same value of $80, ensuring you receive the best possible service and satisfaction. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your needs with our top-tier solution. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $80. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $80
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
